page.title: 11PROPOSED TRUNK ROAD
page.content: One of the most{controversial issues} during the last decade has been proposals to{construct a trunk road} through the countryside contained in this survey area. The present{A27 coast road}is only a {single carriageway}and carries large numbers of vehicles including heavy lorries.It is not adequate to carry the present volume of traffic. The new road would be{between Havant} {and Fishbourne}but cut through farms,woods and homes.A public inquiry proved very heated with numerous objectors and alternative routes. In{1985}the Minister for Transport approved a proposed route and construction work has already begun. Despite objections the{numerous } {accidents}on the existing road stress the importance of the new road.
